compactSpacesFor

public static java.lang.String compactSpacesFor(java.lang.String str)
                                         throws AnagramException
Removes redundant space charaters from a string. A space charater is considered redundant if it is not inside ``,'' or "" pair and it is after another space character.

Throws:
AnagramException
